verses.verse: <S%G1161>It<s%> <S%G1096>happened<s%> <S%G1722>that,<s%> while <S%G625>Apollos<s%> <S%G1511>was<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2882>Corinth,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> having passed <S%G1330>through<s%> the <S%G510>upper<s%> <S%G3313>country,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

He <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1487>"Did<s%> you <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> when you <S%G4100>believed?<s%>" <S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G235>him,<s%> <S%G191>"No,<s%> we haven't <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1487>that<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>"

<S%G5037>He<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4314><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519>"Into<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> were you <S%G907>baptized?<s%>" <S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1519>"Into<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>'s <S%G908>baptism.<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2491>"<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the one <S%G3588>who<s%> would <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G5547><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>"
<S%G1161>When<s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G907>this,<s%> they were baptized <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> on <S%G846>them,<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> they <S%G2980>spoke<s%> with other <S%G1100>languages<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied.<s%>
<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G1177>twelve<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> in <S%G3956>all.<s%>

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> and spoke <S%G3955>boldly<s%> for a period <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3376>months,<s%> <S%G1256>reasoning<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3982>persuading<s%> about the <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> were <S%G4645>hardened<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G544>disobedient,<s%> speaking <S%G2551>evil<s%> of the <S%G3598>Way<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude,<s%> he <S%G868>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> and <S%G873>separated<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1256>reasoning<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250>daily<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4981>school<s%> <S%G5100>of<s%> <S%G5181>Tyrannus.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> <S%G1096>continued<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>lived<s%> in <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks.<s%>
<S%G5037><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4160>worked<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5177>special<s%> <S%G1411>miracles<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G3972>Paul,<s%>

so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G4676>handkerchiefs<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4612>aprons<s%> were <S%G2018>carried<s%> away <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5559>body<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G770>sick,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> went <S%G525>out.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G4022>itinerant<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G1845>exorcists,<s%> took on <S%G2021>themselves<s%> to <S%G3687>invoke<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G2021>those<s%> who <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "We <S%G3726>adjure<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2784>preaches.<s%>"

<S%G1161>There<s%> <S%G2258%G99999>were<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> <S%G4630>of<s%> one <S%G4630>Sceva,<s%> a <S%G2453>Jewish<s%> chief <S%G749>priest,<s%> who <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5124>this.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G2036><s%> <S%G2424>"Jesus<s%> I <S%G1097>know,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> I <S%G1987>know,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G5210>you?<s%>"

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2177>leaped<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2634>overpowered<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> and <S%G2480>prevailed<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> they <S%G1628>fled<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G1131>naked<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5135>wounded.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G1110>known<s%> to <S%G3956>all,<s%> both <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks,<s%> <S%G5037>who<s%> <S%G2730>lived<s%> at <S%G2181>Ephesus.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5401>Fear<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G3170>magnified.<s%>

<S%G4183>Many<s%> <S%G5037>also<s%> of those <S%G3588>who<s%> had <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G1843>confessing,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G312>declaring<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4234>deeds.<s%>

<S%G2425>Many<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4238>practiced<s%> magical <S%G4021>arts<s%> brought <S%G4851>their<s%> <S%G976>books<s%> <S%G4851>together<s%> and burned <S%G2618>them<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G3956>all.<s%> <S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G4860>counted<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5092>price,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> it to be <S%G4002>fifty<s%> <S%G3461>thousand<s%> pieces of <S%G694>silver.<s%>
<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was <S%G837>growing<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2480>becoming<s%> <S%G2904>mighty.<s%>

Now <S%G5613>after<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> had <S%G4137>ended,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5087>determined<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> when he had passed <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3754>saying,<s%> <S%G3326>"After<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> have <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4516>Rome.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Having<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1247>served<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2037>Erastus,<s%> <S%G1907>he<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G1907>stayed<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%> for a <S%G5550>while.<s%>
<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2596>About<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3641>small<s%> <S%G5017>stir<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G3598>Way.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> man <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1216>Demetrius,<s%> a <S%G695>silversmith,<s%> who <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G693>silver<s%> <S%G3485>shrines<s%> of <S%G735>Artemis,<s%> <S%G3930>brought<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G2039>business<s%> to the <S%G5079>craftsmen,<s%>

<S%G3739>whom<s%> he gathered <S%G4867>together,<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> the <S%G2040>workmen<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> like <S%G5108>occupation,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G435>"Sirs,<s%> you <S%G1987>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2039>business<s%> we <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2142>wealth.<s%>

<S%G2532>You<s%> <S%G2334>see<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> at <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%> <S%G3440>alone,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4975>almost<s%> <S%G1223>throughout<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G773>Asia,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> has <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> and turned <S%G3179>away<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2316>gods,<s%> that <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> with <S%G5495>hands.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> is there <S%G2793>danger<s%> <S%G1161>that<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2254>our<s%> <S%G3313>trade<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G557>disrepute,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2411>temple<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2299>goddess<s%> <S%G735>Artemis<s%> will be <S%G1519>counted<s%> as <S%G1161>nothing,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3168>majesty<s%> <S%G2507>destroyed,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> <S%G4576>worships.<s%>"

<S%G1161>When<s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> this they <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G4134>filled<s%> with <S%G2372>anger,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> cried <S%G2896>out,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3173>"Great<s%> is <S%G735>Artemis<s%> of the <S%G2180>Ephesians!<s%>"

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G4130>filled<s%> with <S%G4799>confusion,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> they <S%G3729>rushed<s%> with one <S%G3661>accord<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2302>theater,<s%> having <S%G4884>seized<s%> <S%G1050>Gaius<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G708>Aristarchus,<s%> men of <S%G3110>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>'s companions in <S%G4898>travel.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1014>wanted<s%> to enter <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1218>people,<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1439>allow<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>Certain<s%> also of the <S%G775>Asiarchs,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5384>friends,<s%> <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> and <S%G3870>begged<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G1438>venture<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2302>theater.<s%>

<S%G243>Some<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> cried one <S%G2896>thing,<s%> <S%G3303>and<s%> <S%G243>some<s%> <S%G5100>another,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> in <S%G4797>confusion.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4119>Most<s%> of them <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1492%G99999>know<s%> <S%G1752>why<s%> they had come <S%G4905>together.<s%>

<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G4264>brought<s%> <S%G223>Alexander<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4261>putting<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4261>forward.<s%> <S%G223>Alexander<s%> <S%G2678>beckoned<s%> with his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> would <S%G2309>have<s%> made a <S%G626>defense<s%> to the <S%G1218>people.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> when they <S%G1921>perceived<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%> a <S%G1537>Jew,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1096>with<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> for a <S%G5613>time<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> about <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5610>hours<s%> cried <S%G2896>out,<s%> <S%G3173>"Great<s%> is <S%G735>Artemis<s%> of the <S%G2180>Ephesians!<s%>"

When the town <S%G1122>clerk<s%> had <S%G2687>quieted<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> he <S%G5346>said,<s%> "You <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G1063>Ephesus,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G2076>there<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of the <S%G2180>Ephesians<s%> <S%G5607>is<s%> temple <S%G3511>keeper<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2299>goddess<s%> <S%G735>Artemis,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G1356>the<s%> image which fell down from <S%G1356>Zeus?<s%>

<S%G5607>Seeing<s%> then <S%G3767>that<s%> these <S%G5130>things<s%> <S%G368>can't<s%> be denied, <S%G5209%G99999>you<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G5225>be<s%> <S%G2687>quiet,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G4238>do<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G4312>rash.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> you have brought <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G71>here,<s%> who <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> robbers of <S%G2417>temples<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G987>blasphemers<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2299>goddess.<s%>
